recent class "Teaching with TRACS". Now that the class has
concluded, we'd love to get your feedback!

The instructor for this course has set up a survey to
collect feedback on this course. Please click here
(http://localhost/tracssurvey) to complete the survey if
you haven't already done so. Thank you!

Thanks in advance for your feedback! We really
hope you enjoyed the class. To find more classes offered by
ITS or other departments, check out the list of upcoming
sessions here (http://localhost:3000/).
